Description.Text: Location This beach hotel is situated in the tourist centre of Benidorn, within metres of a good selection of shops, bars, restaurants and links to the public transport network. The nearest beach is just 200 m away and the nearest nightclub lies 2 km from the hotel. Facilities This hotel was built in 1968. Travellers can feel at home in one of the 104 rooms. In the air-conditioned establishment, guests are welcomed at the reception area with 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-in/check-out service. Most of the storeys can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a restaurant, a café, a bar, a TV room, a playroom and a hairdresser. Travellers can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. The grounds of the accommodation feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park (for a fee). Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony with a view for guests' enjoyment. All rooms feature a telephone, a TV and a safe. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. The sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great place to unwind. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. There is also a poolside snack bar. Tennis, crazy golf and golf are available to active guests. A gym and billiards, or for a fee, squash, are among the sport and leisure options available at the hotel. A wellness area with a sauna, a hammam and a solarium is available at the establishment. Activity coordinators at the accommodation organise an entertainment programme for adults and children. Meals Travellers can choose from a range of snacks and meals including breakfast, lunch or dinner. The show cooking is a particular attraction. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: VISA and MasterCard.

This beach hotel is situated in the tourist centre of Benidorn, within metres of a good selection of shops, bars, restaurants and links to the public transport network. The nearest beach is just 200 m away and the nearest nightclub lies 2 km from the hotel.

Rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony with a view for guests' enjoyment. All rooms feature a telephone, a TV and a safe. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms.

This hotel was built in 1968. Travellers can feel at home in one of the 104 rooms. In the air-conditioned establishment, guests are welcomed at the reception area with 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-in/check-out service. Most of the storeys can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a restaurant, a café, a bar, a TV room, a playroom and a hairdresser. Travellers can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. The grounds of the accommodation feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park (for a fee).

A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. The sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great place to unwind. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. There is also a poolside snack bar. Tennis, crazy golf and golf are available to active guests. A gym and billiards, or for a fee, squash, are among the sport and leisure options available at the hotel. A wellness area with a sauna, a hammam and a solarium is available at the establishment. Activity coordinators at the accommodation organise an entertainment programme for adults and children.
Travellers can choose from a range of snacks and meals including breakfast, lunch or dinner. The show cooking is a particular attraction.
The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: VISA and MasterCard.
